title: The One Piece Podcast - 4'ced To Watch 4Kids #2 'Buggy Balls'
author: Steve and Alex
description: Hosts Steve and Alex review the 4Kids' adaptation of Orange Town, covering Episodes 5-8 with a focus on Buggy's introduction and the censorship of the 4Kids version.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through the end of Orange Town Arc

title: Straw Hat Social Club - One Piece Recap 2: Orange Town
author: Straw Hat Social Club
description: A comprehensive recap of the Orange Town Arc (episodes 4-8), discussing Buggy the Clown's introduction as the second devil fruit user and Nami's first appearance.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Spoiler-free discussion limited to Orange Town Arc only

title: One Piece: Buggy's Bara Bara No Mi, Explained
author: Game Rant Editorial
description: An in-depth analysis of Buggy's Bara Bara no Mi Devil Fruit, explaining its abilities, strengths, weaknesses, and significance in the One Piece story.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Buggy's later role in the series

title: One Piece: Why Did Nami Betray The Straw Hat Pirates At The Start?
author: CBR Editorial
description: An analysis of Nami's character motivations, examining why she betrayed Luffy in Orange Town and her deeper motivations involving Arlong.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Nami's backstory and the Arlong Park Arc

title: One Piece: There May Be Much More To Buggy's Devil Fruit Than You Think
author: Game Rant Editorial
description: An article exploring fan theories about the Bara Bara no Mi potentially being more powerful than initially revealed, drawing parallels to Luffy's fruit reveal.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about late-series reveals and Buggy's Emperor status

title: Journey into the World of Pirates: Orange Town Arc
author: AnimeTipz
description: A comprehensive summary and analysis of the Orange Town Arc, discussing the introduction of Nami and Buggy, and the arc's themes and importance.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Limited to Orange Town Arc only

title: One Piece Orange Town Arc Review - Episodes 4-8
author: DL Studios
description: A review of the Orange Town Arc episodes 4-8, examining the pacing, character introductions, and story significance.
